fullplot: A graduate student (Nicholson) copes with a recent breakup by conducting interviews with various men.
plot: A graduate student (Nicholson) copes with a recent breakup by conducting interviews with various men.
title: Brief Interviews with Hideous Men

tomatoes.consensus: Ambitious but uneven, John Krasinski's adaptation of David Foster Wallace's Brief Interviews with Hideous Men tries hard but doesn't match the depth of the book.
